name: The Shift Project
goal: The Shift Project, a non-profit organisation, is a French think-tank dedicated to informing and influencing the debate on energy transition in Europe. Informing: we establish working groups on the most sensitive and decisive issues of the transition, with particular attention to appropriately-scaled solutions. Influencing: we promote the recommendations of our working groups to political and economic decision-makers. The Shift Project is funded by European companies that want to make the energy transition their strategic priority.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
On the Juncker Plan : SFTE proposition
On the EU ETS Structural Reform & MSR
Climate Action
